argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | oppglt.1 | |- O = ( oppG ` R ) |
| 2 |  | oppglt.2 | |- .< = ( lt ` R ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( le ` R ) = ( le ` R ) |
| 4 | 3, 2 | #P_pltfval | |- ( R e. V -> .< = ( ( le ` R ) \ _I ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( oppG ` R ) e. _V |
| 6 | 1, 5 | #P_eqeltri | |- O e. _V |
| 7 | 1, 3 | #P_oppgle | |- ( le ` R ) = ( le ` O ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( lt ` O ) = ( lt ` O ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_pltfval | |- ( O e. _V -> ( lt ` O ) = ( ( le ` R ) \ _I ) ) |
| 10 | 6, 9 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( lt ` O ) = ( ( le ` R ) \ _I ) |
| 11 | 4, 10 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( R e. V -> .< = ( lt ` O ) ) |
